trans-unit.source: Represents an extensibility element added to an <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding" /> or an <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding" />.
trans-unit.target: 表示已加入至 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.InputBinding" /> 或 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.OutputBinding" /> 的擴充性項目。

trans-unit.source: This class specifies how messages, either abstract type definitions or concrete schema definitions, appear within the SOAP body element of the transmission.
trans-unit.target: 這個類別指定抽象型別定義或實體的結構描述定義的訊息傳輸的 SOAP body 項目內的顯示方式。

trans-unit.source: For more information about specifying protocols for XML Web services, see [[\<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices>]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c).
trans-unit.target: 如需有關指定的 XML Web 服務通訊協定的詳細資訊，請參閱[ [ \<topic://cpconbuildingaspnetwebservices >]](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/01dfc27c-c68e-4910-a0aa-5e4c2a766b0c)。

trans-unit.source: For more information about Web Services Description Language (WSDL), see the specification at http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/.
trans-unit.target: 如需 Web 服務描述語言 (WSDL) 的詳細資訊，請參閱規格的http://www.w3.org/TR/wsdl/。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBodyBinding" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBodyBinding" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a string containing a list of space-delimited URIs.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定包含空格分隔 URI 清單的字串。

trans-unit.source: The URIs represent the encoding style (or styles) to be used to encode messages within the SOAP body.
trans-unit.target: URI 表示要用來在 SOAP Body 中編碼訊息的一種編碼樣式 (或多種樣式)。

trans-unit.source: A string containing a list of URIs.
trans-unit.target: 包含 URI 清單的字串。

trans-unit.source: The default value is an empty string ("").
trans-unit.target: 預設值為空字串 ("")。

trans-unit.source: The value of this property should be set only if the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBodyBinding.Use%2A> property is `Encoded`.
trans-unit.target: 應該設定這個屬性的值，只有當值<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBodyBinding.Use%2A>屬性是`Encoded`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise this property value will be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 否則會忽略這個屬性值。

trans-unit.source: Get or sets the URI representing the location of the specifications for encoding of content not specifically defined by the <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBodyBinding.Encoding" /> property.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定 URI，表示未特別由 <see cref="P:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBodyBinding.Encoding" /> 屬性所定義的內容之編碼方式的規格位置。

trans-unit.source: A string containing a URI.
trans-unit.target: 包含 URI 的字串。

trans-unit.source: This property will return an empty string ("") if the property value has not been set.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回空字串 ("") 如果尚未設定屬性值。

trans-unit.source: The value should only be set if the value of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBodyBinding.Use%2A> property is `Encoded`.
trans-unit.target: 如果此值只可設定的值<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBodyBinding.Use%2A>屬性是`Encoded`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the property value will be ignored, thus leading to unexpected behavior by the XML Web service.
trans-unit.target: 否則屬性值都會被忽略，因此導致非預期的行為由 XML Web 服務。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating which parts of the transmitted message appear within the SOAP body portion of the transmission.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出傳輸訊息的那些部分出現在傳輸的 SOAP Body 部分中。

trans-unit.source: A string array containing the names of the appropriate message parts.
trans-unit.target: 字串陣列，包含適當訊息部分的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Some parts of the transmitted message can appear in portions other than the SOAP body, such as when SOAP is used with a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimeMultipartRelatedBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 傳輸訊息的某些部分可以出現在 SOAP 主體，例如 SOAP 搭配當之外的某些部分<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimeMultipartRelatedBinding>。

trans-unit.source: In such a case, the other members of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimePart.Extensions%2A> property determine the locations of the other parts of the message.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況的其他成員<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimePart.Extensions%2A>屬性決定訊息的其他組件的位置。

trans-unit.source: This property returns exactly the same information as the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBodyBinding.PartsString%2A> property, but the results are returned within an array rather than within a space-delimited string.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回完全相同的資訊<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBodyBinding.PartsString%2A>屬性，但是結果會傳回陣列中，而不是以空格分隔的字串內。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value indicating which parts of the transmitted message appear within the SOAP body portion of the transmission.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定值，指出傳輸訊息的那些部分出現在傳輸的 SOAP Body 部分中。

trans-unit.source: A space-delimited string containing the appropriate message parts.
trans-unit.target: 空格分隔的字串，包含適當的訊息部分。

trans-unit.source: Some parts of the transmitted message can appear in portions other than the SOAP body, such as when SOAP is used with a <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimeMultipartRelatedBinding>.
trans-unit.target: 傳輸訊息的某些部分可以出現在 SOAP 主體，例如 SOAP 搭配當之外的某些部分<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimeMultipartRelatedBinding>。

trans-unit.source: In such a case, the other members of the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimePart.Extensions%2A> property determine the locations of other parts of the message.
trans-unit.target: 在此情況的其他成員<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.MimePart.Extensions%2A>屬性決定訊息的其他組件的位置。

trans-unit.source: This property returns exactly the same information as the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBodyBinding.Parts%2A> property, but the results are returned within a space-delimited string rather than within an array.
trans-unit.target: 這個屬性會傳回完全相同的資訊<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBodyBinding.Parts%2A>屬性，但是結果會傳回以空格分隔的字串內，而不是陣列中。

trans-unit.source: PartsString is used internally for xml serialization and shouldn't be called directly.
trans-unit.target: PartsString 用於內部以取得 xml 序列化，而且不應該直接呼叫。

trans-unit.source: To return the transmitted message parts appearing within the SOAP body portion of the transmission, use the <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBodyBinding.Parts%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 若要傳回傳送的訊息部分傳輸 SOAP 本文部分內出現，請使用<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBodyBinding.Parts%2A>屬性。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the message parts are encoded using specified encoding rules, or define the concrete schema of the message.
trans-unit.target: 指示訊息部分使用指定的編碼規則編碼，或定義訊息的具體結構描述 (Schema)。

trans-unit.source: One of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse" /> values.
trans-unit.target: 其中一個 <see cref="T:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBindingUse" /> 值。

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="Default" />.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 <see langword="Default" />。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBodyBinding.Namespace%2A> and <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBodyBinding.Encoding%2A> properties depend on the value of this property.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBodyBinding.Namespace%2A>和<xref:System.Web.Services.Description.SoapBodyBinding.Encoding%2A>屬性取決於這個屬性的值。

trans-unit.source: Their values should be set only if the value of this property is `Encoded`.
trans-unit.target: 只有當這個屬性的值，它們的值應該設定`Encoded`。

trans-unit.source: Otherwise the XML Web service will produce unexpected behavior.
trans-unit.target: 否則 XML Web service 會產生非預期的行為。

trans-unit.source: SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#9
trans-unit.target: SoapBinding_SoapOperationBinding#9
